title: Skin ward bug
body:
So, I know this is a known issue and people are looking into it.
The bug never happened to me until today, and it only started happening when I upgraded my trinket ward. **After upgrading the trinket ward** it started placing wards with skins I don't own.
Just wanted to share the info, hope it helps.

replies.body: Thanks for the info! It appears to only happen with the trinket upgrade, and it's pulling the ward skin that comes before the one you currently have selected.
